divs: sighting detailsmyself age 8?? my sister age 10?? my mother and father all in the '68 mustang in late january 1972?? it was my fathers parents 50th wedding anniversary,they lived 1\4 mile east of our home.it was 9 p.m.on a cold starry night we lived down a road off of route 44 in east canaan ct.as we were coming to the top of the driveway onto route 44 we all noticed directly in front of us about 1\4 mile away hovering about 500 feet from the ground a big at least 60'wide x 20 ' tall saucer shaped object with revolving circular lights situated around the outside circular perimeter of the craft red, white, and green,they were i think revolving in a clockwise motion and blinking very fast.across from our driveway and route 44 is a cemetary and behind that is a working gravel bed.this object was hovering over the gravel bed.in distance it was about 1\4 mile away or less.all of us in the car were looking at each other not saying a word.it was a moonlit night and you could see the shape of the object.you could even see that it had a dome shaped top.the whole time this event took place not one car went by.it was very eerie watching this thing because we clearly knew it was not something human.you could just feel it.we were all raised in farm country and pretty much lived off the land so to speak.you get a feeling about things,whats supposed to be and whats not,nature, one with the land ,signs etc.the feeling i had coming from this thing was all bad!!!!what was even weirder was we all had our windows down and you could hav eheard a pin drop!! no noise coming from this thing. the time frame was about 10 minutes.then suddenly the object slowly sank behind the tree line that seperated the pit from the graveyard in front of the gravel pit and out of sight,there was a very bright white flash after it went out of sight.my father immediately looked at us and said we were to say nothing to no one at school about this at all and we never did.i have not told many people about this at all.about 1 week after this happened i started having really horrible nightmares.i would dream this horrible monster was coming to slowly get me and just when he was reaching to get me i would wake screaming in a pool of sweat sometimes even wetting my bed.this went on for about 4 years !!then one day the dreams just stopped.there is another story involving the same type of craft we saw that was told to me by a guy who never heard my story and he described the same exact craft that we saw that night.but his story involves cattle mutilation and actually seeing the beings!! pretty hairy stuff.his sighting was not 1\2 mile from where my family saw the craft.his event was in 1989.that's it it's real and it happened! my whole family saw this thing.i have carried it with me all these years and now you know it too.they are out there and after seeing what i saw that night i cannot believe otherwise!! all the best:mario gandolfo
Summary: My whole family (4) saw this saucer not 1/4 mile away from us hovering for at least 10 minutes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Canaan
There were no other sightings in North Canaan on or around January 15th 1972
